message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $180. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $150. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest. I could meet you halfway at $165.  What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $155. Would you be willing to accept that price?
